TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ClipboardProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于操控剪贴板的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for manipulating the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使在应用程序关闭后，移动或复制到剪贴板的项也会保留。Items moved or copied to the Clipboard persist even after the application is shut down. 剪贴板上的数据可以是任何数据格式，也称为剪贴板格式。Data on the Clipboard can be in any data format, also called a Clipboard format. 有关要用于剪贴板的预定义格式的列表，请参阅 。For a list of predefined formats to use with the Clipboard, see . 当将某个项移动或复制到剪贴板时，将清除其他格式的项。When an item is moved or copied to the Clipboard, items in other formats are cleared. 若要使其他格式保持不变，请使用 ，它将复制当前剪贴板上的所有内容，包括从其他应用程序中粘贴的项。To make other formats persist, use , which copies everything existing on the current Clipboard, including items pasted from other applications. 将数据置于剪贴板中的多种格式，以最大程度地提高可能不知道其格式要求的目标应用程序可以成功检索数据的可能性。Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data. 由于所有 Windows 应用程序都共享系统剪贴板，因此当你切换到另一个应用程序时，内容可能会更改。Because all Windows applications share the system Clipboard, the contents may change when you switch to another application. 类必须可序列化，以将其放在剪贴板上。A class must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [序列化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5) 。See [Serialization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f7570c09-7db5-44f2-983a-e8859caeb0d5) for more information. 远程访问剪贴板时， 除非访问线程 (单线程单元) 模式下运行，否则将引发。When accessing the Clipboard remotely, a is thrown unless the accessing thread operates in STA (single-threaded apartment) mode. 若要解决此问题，请将设置 `ThreadApartmentState` 为 `STA` 。To resolve this issue, set the `ThreadApartmentState` to `STA`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [将数据存储到剪贴板以及从剪贴板读取数据](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard)。For more information, see [Storing Data to and Reading from the Clipboard](/dotnet/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/storing-data-to-and-reading-from-the-clipboard). ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将剪贴板中的文本读入字符串 `textOnClipboard` 。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有文本，此示例将失败。This example will fail if there is no text on the Clipboard.

span.span: Objects (Visual Basic)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 清除剪贴板。

span.span: Clears the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类控制对剪贴板的访问，关联的 枚举值指示访问级别。The class controls access to the Clipboard, and the associated enumeration value indicates the level of access. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体中的其他安全注意事项](/dotnet/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms)。For more information, see [Additional Security Considerations in Windows Forms](/dotnet/framework/winforms/additional-security-considerations-in-windows-forms). ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例清除剪贴板。This example clears the Clipboard. ``` My.Computer.Clipboard.Clear() ``` 这将从剪贴板中删除所有数据。This removes all data from the Clipboard.

span.span: if audio data is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将确定剪贴板是否包含音频数据并显示结果。This example determines whether the Clipboard contains audio data and displays the result. summary.span: 指示剪贴板是否包含指定的自定义格式的数据。

span.span: Indicates whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified custom format.

returns.span: 如果剪贴板上存储有指定的自定义格式的数据，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if data in the specified custom format is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将自定义格式的数据放置在剪贴板上，则此方法允许您在剪贴板上检查该格式的数据。If you have placed custom formatted data on the Clipboard, this method allows you to check the Clipboard for data in that format. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将检查自定义格式的数据 `specialFormat` 。This example checks for data in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 替换 `specialFormat` 为要检查的自定义格式的名称。Replace `specialFormat` with the name of the custom format you wish to check.

summary.span: 返回一个 ，该值指示剪贴板是否包含文件下拉列表。

returns.span: 如果剪贴板中存储有文件下拉列表，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a file drop list is stored on the Clipboard; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件放置列表是包含文件的路径信息的字符串的集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例确定剪贴板上是否有文件放置列表，如果存在，则将列表添加到中 `ListBox.lstFiles` 。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 如果未命名，则此代码将创建异常 `ListBox` `lstFiles` 。This code will create an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将检查剪贴板上是否有图像，如果有，则获取图像并将其添加到中 `PictureBox1` 。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard and, if so, gets the image and adds it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#8)] 此示例依赖于是否存在 `PictureBox` 已命名的 `PictureBox1` 。This example depends on the existence of a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例从剪贴板读取格式的数据 `specialformat` ，并将其写入文件。This example reads data in the format `specialformat` from the Clipboard and writes it to file. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 替换 `specialformat` 为要检索的自定义数据格式。Replace `specialformat` with the custom data format you wish to retrieve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 " **全部** " 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例以形式从剪贴板读取数据 ，然后将其写入文件。This example reads data from the Clipboard in the form of an and then writes it to a file. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#1)] 替换为要 `C:\mylogfile` 写入的文件的名称。Replace `C:\mylogfile` with the name of the file to which you want to write.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法仅适用于非服务器应用程序。This method is available only for non-server applications. 文件放置列表是包含文件的路径信息的字符串的集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例确定剪贴板上是否有文件放置列表，如果存在，则将列表添加到中 `ListBox.lstFiles` 。This example determines if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard and adds the list to the `ListBox.lstFiles` if they exist. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 如果没有命名，此代码会创建一个 `ListBox` 异常 `lstFiles` 。This code creates an exception if there is no `ListBox` named `lstFiles`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 本示例先检查剪贴板中是否存在图像，然后再检索图像并将其分配给 `PictureBox1`。This example checks to see if there is an image on the Clipboard before retrieving it and assigning it to `PictureBox1`. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 若要使此示例正常运行，必须 `PictureBox` `PictureBox1` 在窗体上指定。For this example to function correctly, there must be a `PictureBox` named `PictureBox1` on your form.

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the or format, depending on the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式 为 、 和 。Possible formats are , , and . ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将剪贴板中的文本读入字符串 `textOnClipboard` 。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有任何文本，则此示例失败。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetText(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat format) cil managed
Public Function GetText (format As TextDataFormat) As String

param.name: format
param.span: 如果指定，则标识应检索的文本格式。

span.span: If specified, identifies what text format should be retrieved.
Default is .
Required.

summary.span: 检索剪贴板上的文本。

span.span: Retrieves text from the Clipboard.

returns.span: 剪贴板文本数据；如果剪贴板中不包含指定格式的数据，则为空字符串。

span.span: The Clipboard text data or an empty string if the Clipboard does not contain data in the specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的格式 为 、 和 。Possible formats are , , and . ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将剪贴板中的文本读入字符串 `textOnClipboard` 。This example reads text from the Clipboard into the string `textOnClipboard`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 如果剪贴板上没有任何文本，则此示例失败。This example fails if there is no text on the Clipboard.

summary.span: 将音频数据写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetAudio(unsigned int8[] audioBytes) cil managed

param.name: audioBytes

span.span: array.

param.span: 要写入剪贴板的音频数据。

span.span: Audio data to be written to the Clipboard.
Required.

summary.span: 将音频数据写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes audio data to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将创建字节数组 `musicReader`，向其中读取文件 `cool.wav`，然后将其写入剪贴板。This example creates the byte array `musicReader`, reads the file `cool.wav` into it, and then writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 替换 `cool.wav` 为要读取的文件的名称和路径。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

[!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 替换 `cool.wav` 为要读取的文件的名称和路径。Replace `cool.wav` with the name and path of the file you wish to read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将以自定义格式 `specialFormat` 向剪贴板写入 `DataObject.dataChunk`。This example writes the `DataObject.dataChunk` to the Clipboard in the custom format `specialFormat`. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例依赖于自定义数据格式是否存在 `specialFormat` 。This example depends on the existence of the custom data format `specialFormat`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个高级成员;除非您单击 " **全部** " 选项卡，否则它不会显示在 IntelliSense 中。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例将数据对象写入 `dataChunk` 剪贴板。This example writes the data object `dataChunk` to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyClipboard#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyClipboard/VB/Class1.vb#9)] 此示例取决于数据对象是否存在 `dataChunk` 。This example depends on the existence of the data object `dataChunk`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetFileDropList(class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection filePaths) cil managed

span.span: List of file names.
Required.

summary.span: 将表示文件路径的字符串的集合写入剪贴板。

span.span: Writes a collection of strings representing file paths to the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件删除列表是表示文件名称的字符串的集合。A file drop list is a collection of strings representing file names. > [!IMPORTANT] > 由于其他用户可访问剪贴板，不要将其用于存储密码或机密数据等敏感信息。Because the Clipboard can be accessed by other users, do not use it to store sensitive information, such as passwords or confidential data. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |------------------|---------------| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例从 **MyDocuments**获取文件名的集合，将其转换为文件放置列表，并将其写入剪贴板。This example gets the collection of file names from **MyDocuments**, converts it to a file drop list, and writes it to the Clipboard. [!code-vb[VbRefClipbd#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRefClipbd/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
